english.segment1: Every knee will bow. And every tongue confess. That Jesus Christ is Lord. Lord and King
english.segment2: All glory to Your name. All honour to Your Majesty. Forever, forever. All praise to You alone
english.segment3: Every eye will see. And every heart will know. The beauty of the Lord. In all the earth
english.segment4: All praise to You alone. All praise to You alone. All praise to You alone
